welcome.title: Kuntarekry - Find jobs in Finland

forJobSeeker.title: For Job Seekers
forJobSeeker.text: <title> we provide tools to find jobs and substitutes and information on working in the municipal sector and wellbeing services counties. Most job advertisements and application forms are available only in Finnish or Swedish.

forEmployer.title: For Employers
forEmployer.text: <title> - municipalities, cities, joint municipal authorities, municipal-owned businesses and wellbeing services counties we provide recruitment software and expert services that are suitable for external and internal recruitment as well as recruitment management.

welcome.privacyAndAccessibility: Our web service uses cookies to improve the user experience. By using this service you agree to our use of cookies. <privacyPolicy> and <privacyNotice> and <accessibilityStatement>.
welcome.findOnSocialMedia: You can also find us here

recommendedJobs.openApplicationText: Interested in open applications? Click below.
recommendedJobs.substitutionsText: Intersted in temporary job? Click below.

extendedJobs.description: Would you be interested in some of these jobs?
